name: 方圓
objective:
以網際網路為本，介紹電腦網路基本概念與企業實務運作，奠定網路架構基礎，並說明資訊安全的重要性。

This course aims at teaching the basic, introductory networking topics as a firm foundation with the latest advances in wireless networking and providing the importance and ins and outs of information security as well.
schedule:
1 2/23 Introduction and Overview
2 3/2 Network Models 
3 3/9 Physical layer: Digital Transmission, Analog Transmission
4 3/16 Physical layer: Bandwidth Utilization, Transmission Media, Switching
5 3/23 Data link layer: Error Detection and Correction, DLC
6 3/30 Data link layer: MAC, Wired LANs
7 4/6 運動會補假 
8 4/13 Data link layer: Wireless LANs, Connecting Devices and Virtual LANs
9 4/20 期中考試
10 4/27 專家演講
11 5/4 Network Layer: Network-Layer Protocols, 
12 5/11 Network Layer: Unicast Routing, Multicast Routing, 
13 5/18 Next Generation IP, Introduction to Transport Layer
14 5/25 Transport Layer: Internet Transport-Layer Protocols
15 6/1 Application Layer: Standard Client-Server Protocols, Network Management
16 6/8 Application Layer: Multimedia, Peer-to-Peer Paradigm
17 6/15 Topics Related to All Layers, Security
18 6/22 期末考試
scorePolicy:
平時：30%（3次作業，各10%）
期中考：30%
期末考：40%
額外加分：5%
materials:
Data Communications and Networking, 5E, Behrouz A. Forouzan, McGraw-Hill, 2013.（textbook）
Business Data Networks and Security, 10th Edition, Raymond R. Panko and Julia L. Panko, 2015, Pearson.
Computer Networking : A Top-Down Approach, 7/e Keith Ross (author), James Kurose (author)
